caption: After Giulio Romano (Italian, 1499–1546), Triumph of Scipio II, Right Side, early 16th century. Pen, brown ink and brown wash heightened with white probably on brown prepared paper; 34.9 x 33.1 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1947-2)
